channel.title: Vectorization on GIS, maps + data @ Harvard Library
channel.description: Recent content in Vectorization on GIS, maps + data @ Harvard Library

item.title: Adding historic maps to a Felt map
item.description: In this tutorial, which exists as part of the GIS Mapping Quickstart , we will practice obtaining a georeferenced historical map from the Harvard Geospatial Library (HGL) , and uploading that map to a shareable map using the web mapping tool, Felt.com . You can read this guide to generally learn more about the Harvard Map Collection’s georeferenced collections, or follow along step by step by signing up for a Felt.com and making a web map.
